Pre-Game Insights: A game between the Washington Nationals and Pittsburgh Pirates was postponed Friday night because of rain in the forecast.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be made up as part of a split doubleheader on Saturday, with the first game scheduled for 1:35 p.m. and the nightcap for 6:40 p.m.
Others: Luis Ortiz (6-4, 3.19 ERA) will be the Pirates starting pitcher in Game 1 followed by Mitch Keller (11-9, 3.88). The Nationals will start two rookie left-handers -- DJ Herz (2-7, 4.09) and Mitchell Parker (7-9, 4.27).
